entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.IFRS.0115.9565] The concept ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod with a period duration starting on 2019-07-31 and ending on 2019-08-01 or 1 days with a reported value of 330,397 has a value greater than the value of the same element with a longer or equivalent period duration that starts on 2018-12-31 and ends on 2019-12-31 with a value of 258,001. The value 330,397 for the period of 1 days should be less or the same as the value 258,001 with a duration of 365 days assuming that the concept ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod cannot have a negative value. The properties of this ifrs-full:ProceedsFromSalesOfInvestmentsAccountedForUsingEquityMethod fact are: Period :2019-08-01 to 2019-08-01 Dimensions : ifrs-full:BusinessCombinationsAxis=towtf:EnervisaUnitedStatedLimitedLiabilityCompanyMember Unit : CAD
Rule Element Id:9565 Rule version: 15.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1579026/000106299320004827/towtf-20191231.xml 12125

property.name: label
property.value: Proceeds from sales of investments accounted for using equity method
